name: Zion - Collab Jam #1 Entry
description:
Brief discription:

Zion is a game in which you slide a cube around a maze to find the exit that may be hidden in every corner!

The game has a total of 20 levels, going from extremely easy to hard.
Now good luck! Try to find all their unexpected solutions!

Controls:

You just need your arrow keys, but no worries there's an in game tutorial waiting for you ;)
